@@ -5,25 +5,190 @@ My Portfolio + - +
-

Diegomez's Portfolio

+

Diegomez's Portfolio

+

About myself

- Hello! My name is Diego Gómez Cota, you can call me Diegomez. I am a junior Computer Science student at Tecnológico de Monterrey. + Hello! My name is Diego Gómez Cota, but you can call me Diegomez. I am a junior Computer Science student at Tecnológico de Monterrey. I am Mexican, love seafood, music (specially techno and hip-hop), and soccer. I come from Sinaloa (north-west coast), I enjoy hot weather and the beach.

-
- +

+ I love tech because we can use it as a tool for helping each other. + It's incredible that you can relate anything you can imagine to tech and have the ability + to deliver a change in those areas. Music, science, and human-interaction are great examples + just to name a few. +

+

My projects

+ +
+

+ I was an intern at Uber last summer. I worked in the Cloud's host-supply team, and my project was to build a web + dashboard where infrastructure engineers can now check high-level server's status and relevant metrics for their team. + We called it ZoneDash. +

+
+ +
+
+ +
+

+ Me and my friends built Mariano in a hackathon, a WhatsApp chatbot that solves FAQs from residents of our college dorms. + We won 1st place 🥳. +

+
+ +
+
+ +
+

+ My team and I developed Roundup as our project of our Videogames course. It promotes staying at home in order to keep + ourselves safe from the pandemic. +

+
+ +
-

Here is my dog, Bruno!

-
+ +

Feel free to add me!

+

What do I enjoy photographing:

+
    +
  • My dog
    • +
  • Random moments of the day
    • +
  • My family
    • +
  • Quality time with my friends
    • +
  • Sunsets
    • +
+

+ Currently I am focusing on taking photos more often. I used to dislike it because it took me out of the moment, but now I + understand the value of saving a frame of the present for the future. "Remember is to re-live" says the + song +

+

My talent (that's one way to call it)

+

+ My friends always ask me for names of specific songs they can't remember (as if I am human-Shazam) and sometimes ask me for + my playlists. I listen to a lot of music, so pairing that with my memory I can remember a lot of names. Here are some of my + favorite albums I've heard recently: +
